titleStmt.title: A gleaning in Gods harvest Foure choyce handfuls; the gate to happinesse. Wounded saviour. Epicures caution. Generation of seekers. By the late judicious divine, Henry Ramsden, sometime preacher in London.
titleStmt.author: Ramsden, Henry, d. 1638.
Goodwin, John, 1594?-1665.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by John Dawson] for J[ohn] D[awson] and R. M[abb] and are to bee sold by Thomas Slater, at the Swan in Duck-lane,

notesStmt.note: Printer's and publishers' names from STC.
The words "Gate to .. seekers." are bracketed together on the title page.
Cf. Folger catalogue which gives signatures: [par.]-2[par.]⁴ A-2F⁴.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
